name: Chainsaw Ambush
description:
Chainsaw Ambush
In a dark forest in the middle of nowhere you find yourself running away from every noise that surrounds you. Is this a dream? Who knows, but he is getting faster... Avoid trees and obstacles while running away from the man with the chainsaw, and remember to always use your trusty flashlight!

Controls:

WASD - movement

Shift - sprint

Flashlight - follows mouse

Notes: This is my first game EVER, so it is very simple and any helpful criticism would be appreciated. Yes, there could have been a lot more effort put into the art and overall gameplay but I wanted to keep my first project simple.
